Articles.Content:
yey. finaly downloading.. after way to many time outs.

almost feel bad for the servers.
Is it just me, or is Gilly EVEN SMALLER?

Discuss about .20, like what you like about it. And what you have done that was awesome.

So far my favorite things about the update is flags, the "Skipper" engine and the kerbal knowledge base:
i love the wheels
Currently downloading, got it before the renowned update crash that always happens, will reply with more
Made a little merge, just as a note, don't spawn a ton of 0.20 discussion threads, this is the main thread right here.

You know what me from the past?

I regret nothing

Full album if you want:

http://imgur.com/a/XXXmX
Apparently, Bob is braver than Jeb...
SEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEETS!!! Aw yeah!
Yey .20 I hope my saves and mods don't break

The game is broken for me. All the parts are missing from the VAB except for three damned robotics parts. No command modules, no propulsion, Nothing. Same with existing saves and brand new games.

I'll try uninstalling mods and/or reinstalling the game later, I'm supposed to be working anyway.
Do persistent and craft files transfer properly?

The game is broken for me. All the parts are missing from the VAB except for three damned robotics parts. No command modules, no propulsion, Nothing. Same with existing saves and brand new games.

I'll try uninstalling mods and/or reinstalling the game later, I'm supposed to be working anyway.

Same, mine is also borked. Save file is fine, mods not working.
Just planted a flag by the Neil Armstrong monument on the Mun! I feel so proud of myself!

We just had the energy company send some guys to cut down a tree that killed our power last night. Get the internet back and find out .20 is released, this is the perfect birthday present! Thank you, Squad, I appreciate the gift

Same, mine is also borked. Save file is fine, mods not working.

Seems like Damned Robotics breaks 0.20. Deleting Plugins/MuMechLib.dll, which came from Damned Robotics, got all the other parts back. My other plugins are "fine" (in that at least I have parts, I haven't really played yet)
this is the happyiest day of my life because i was thinking it wasnt going to come out for like a week

My god. I always have the same problem server overload or not. I just can not get the download link to work. I've been trying to download for an hour.

Edited May 22, 2013 by NuclearWarfare
*spies new version available...* SKEE!!!!!!! *Digs in*

New fairings? Looks great.

Some sick graphics now, the game looks pretty
I read it on Twitter and I was like "dis gonn b gud". Loved the video, will try it out tomorrow! Thanks Squad :3
Wowa!!! LARGE Docking ports. Still my beating heart!
Yes! and tommarows the last day of school!

I still have 2 hours before i get off from work.

I have 4
It's 00:30 here, and I have to get up in 5 hours! Not awesome! D:
